intro.dialogue: So, I'm going to have to be honest here, I haven't thought of any place that we could go to this time.
We should just stay here, I have to recharge my water levels anyways. I was waiting in the bushes for a while.
Alright, that's fine with me. Is there any reason you wanted to scare me?
I felt like you might as well feel some of my pain. And it kinda worked hu hu hu hu.
So, what have you been up to, love? Done anything exciting without me?
Most of my week has been spent looking for flowers for you, to be honest. They're hard to buy around here.
So you got them from the park?
HOW DID YOU KNOW?!
Oh love, I've lived here for most of my life. I might be restricted to just the park, but that doesn't mean I don't leave my pond often, you know. I do appreciate the flowers though.
Man, I feel embarrassed right now. Did you know this whole time?
Yup, but I thought it was cute, so I wasn't going to say anything.
You look adorable when you're embarrassed though. Hu hu hu hu!
Hey now, don't make fun of me!
Don't worry, love, I'm just teasing you. I do mean it when I say you're cute though.
You know you're supposed to be nice to your date, right?
Oh, but I am! I just like seeing my date a little flustered. I guess you're a bit shy when it comes to compliments. Hu hu hu hu!
As if you're one to talk, I saw that blushing face every time I complimented you on our previous dates.
That never happened. You're lying!
So if I call you an adorable, cute-looking octogirl, you wouldn't be blushing?
See, knew you were lying!
So now, on a more serious note, I've been thinking of ways to get you back to the ocean!
Maybe we can rent a small van, put a little plastic swimming pool in there, and drive to the nearest ocean!
Well-
Or maybe I can just lift you to some river nearby and get you to the ocean that way.
Actually-
Or can you move freely in the rain? I don't think you can since you stayed here all this time, but maybe that's an option too?
HEY! I'm trying to tell you something!
I'm not going to move anywhere.
What but you said-
I know what I said before, but I've realized that I really don't have a clue where my family is, or if they would even still be alive.
One thing I do know is that they would want me to be safe, and since this is about the most peaceful you can get, I've decided to stay here.
Plus, a little cutie from Earth helps to make it more bearable too!
Really? Are you just going to live in the pond forever?
You know, it isn't that bad. I've made quite some friends over the years, and I have no one in the ocean.
Plus, I don't think you have gills. It gets kind of hard to breathe underwater without them.
What do you mean? Do you want me to come with you?
Well, you see, I've been thinking about it. You've been so nice to me, and you made me realize how much I have in this park. And in doing so, you made me a lot more confident in my own skin.
I kinda started falling for your kindness towards me on the second date when you went out of your way to lift me to a spot in the park just to have a unique date with me.
I guess I haven't asked yet, so I'll do it right now. I know this is going fast all of a sudden, but I feel like I need to ask.
Do you want to be my partner? Do you want to spend the rest of your life with me?

options.dialogue:
Do you accept her love?
Press W for no.
Press S for Yes.

angry.dialogue: Oh, well, I guess that is to be expected. I got so caught up in my own feelings I didn't even consider that you might not feel the same way about me. It's fine, but I would like to be alone for a while.

happy.dialogue: Yaay! I knew you would say yes. We're going to be the most adorable couple. I'm so happy! You showed me how good life can be, and I'm very grateful for that.
